commands.name: az storage blob metadata show
commands.summary: Return all user-defined metadata for the specified blob or snapshot.
commands.syntax:
az storage blob metadata show [--account-key]
                              [--account-name]
                              [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                              [--blob-endpoint]
                              [--blob-url]
                              [--connection-string]
                              [--container-name]
                              [--if-match]
                              [--if-modified-since]
                              [--if-none-match]
                              [--if-unmodified-since]
                              [--lease-id]
                              [--name]
                              [--sas-token]
                              [--snapshot]
                              [--tags-condition]
                              [--timeout]
examples: az storage blob metadata show --container-name mycontainer --name myblob

commands.name: az storage blob metadata update
commands.summary: Sets user-defined metadata for the blob as one or more name-value pairs.
commands.syntax:
az storage blob metadata update [--account-key]
                                [--account-name]
                                [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                [--blob-endpoint]
                                [--blob-url]
                                [--connection-string]
                                [--container-name]
                                [--if-match]
                                [--if-modified-since]
                                [--if-none-match]
                                [--if-unmodified-since]
                                [--lease-id]
                                [--metadata]
                                [--name]
                                [--sas-token]
                                [--snapshot]
                                [--tags-condition]
                                [--timeout]
examples: az storage blob metadata update --container-name mycontainer --name myblob --metadata key=value
